title: Enterprise Asset Subtype roles and permissions
content:
There are specific roles associated with Enterprise Asset Subtype. Service Management uses role-based permissions to enable you to complete a task that's appropriate to your role. The tenant administrator manages and assigns these permissions.

The following OOB roles are provided with Enterprise Asset Subtype.

Role Responsibilities
Asset & Configuration Administrator Create, view, update, and delete enterprise assets subtype
Asset & Configuration Manager Create, view, and update enterprise assets subtype
CMP Agent View enterprise assets
Contract Manager View enterprise assets
Financial Manager View enterprise assets
Procurement Manager View enterprise assets
SACM Integration View enterprise assets
Note: Create and update permissions might be needed depending on different business requirements.
Software Manager View enterprise assets
Stockroom Admin View enterprise assets

Review the individual permission assignments for each role in Administration > Master Data > People > Roles.

Related topics

  • Roles
  • Enterprise Asset roles and permissions
